references.paper_title: A survey on graph neural networks for time series: Forecasting, classification, imputation, and anomaly detection
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive survey of graph neural networks for various time series tasks, including imputation, which is the focus of the current paper.

references.paper_title: Foundation models for time series analysis: A tutorial and survey
references.reason: This paper offers a comprehensive overview of foundation models for time series analysis, providing valuable context for the current research.

references.paper_title: SAITS: Self-attention-based imputation for time series
references.reason: SAITS is a state-of-the-art time series imputation method, and this paper directly builds upon and improves it.

references.paper_title: BRITS: Bidirectional recurrent imputation for time series
references.reason: BRITS is another significant time series imputation method that the current work builds upon and compares against.

references.paper_title: GP-VAE: Deep probabilistic time series imputation
references.reason: GP-VAE is a deep learning-based imputation method, offering a different approach than recurrent or self-attention methods, and thus provides a valuable point of comparison.
